<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Delete ticket view"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/tickets/views/{viewId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Permanently deletes a saved ticket view from the system. Once deleted, the view cannot be recovered. Users should export or note view configurations before deletion if they may need to recreate them.

**Prerequisites**
1. **viewId** – Use [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/views](/docs/api/tickets/list-ticket-views) to list views and extract `Items[].ViewId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. List views: [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/views](/docs/api/tickets/list-ticket-views) → identify `ViewId` to delete
2. (Optional) Backup: [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/views/\{viewId\}](/docs/api/tickets/get-ticket-view) to save the configuration
3. Delete view: [DELETE /api/v1.0/tickets/views/\{viewId\}](/docs/api/tickets/delete-ticket-view)
4. Verify removal: [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/views](/docs/api/tickets/list-ticket-views) to confirm deletion

**Note**: Only the view owner or administrators can delete views. Shared views may be used by other team members.

**Related Endpoints**
- [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/views](/docs/api/tickets/list-ticket-views) – List views before deletion
- [POST /api/v1.0/tickets/views/new](/docs/api/tickets/create-ticket-view) – Create replacement view

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}

  parameters={[{"name":"viewId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"Identifier of the ticket view to delete.","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"example":"0c8f7039-1234-4e7f-9c22-11c25e7b45b2"}]}
>
